Nate Irwin

Hi. I’m the digital lead for the U.S. National Park Service’s Harpers Ferry Center and I live and play in beautiful Colorado.

Projects

As a National Park Service employee, I’ve undertaken most of my latest work for the federal government. Most of my work is available on the agency’s GitHub organization. Some highlights:
